medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: RUQ pain started at 1am three days ago and has been persistent. Symptoms of anorexia were reported since the onset of pain. Pain has been controlled with Tylenol. The patient experienced fever to 101 last night.
medical_history.family_history: Father has a history of cholecystectomy.
